news.title: UK Open Banking Hits Milestone with 15 Million Users
news.body: In July, open banking in the UK reached a significant milestone, serving over 15 million users, nearly one-third of the adult population. This surge underscores a robust shift towards financial transparency and personalized banking solutions, setting a benchmark for global banking innovation.

news.title: US Department of Commerce Embraces Blockchain for Data
news.body: The US Department of Commerce is pioneering the use of blockchain by partnering with Chainlink and Pyth to publish macroeconomic data, including GDP figures. This initiative not only enhances data transparency but also sets a precedent for governmental adoption of decentralized technologies.

news.title: India Expands UPI Use to Boost Small Business Credit
news.body: The National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) is leveraging its Unified Payments Interface (UPI) to facilitate short-term loans for small businesses, aiming to enhance financial inclusion. This move capitalizes on India's advanced digital payments infrastructure to support economic growth.

news.title: CaixaBank Launches Installment Payments via Apple Pay in Spain
news.body: CaixaBank Payments & Consumer now supports installment payments through Apple Pay, catering to the rising demand for flexible payment options in Spain. This strategic move is poised to strengthen CaixaBank's dominance in the Iberian payment market.

news.title: Rain's $58 Million Funding Boosts Stablecoin Market Confidence
news.body: Stablecoin platform Rain has secured $58 million in Series B funding, led by Sapphire Ventures. This substantial investment highlights growing confidence in stablecoin technologies as a means to ensure more stable digital transactions.
